channel.title: Cannabis on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Cannabis on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Highly Sensitive Medical Cannabis Patient Data Exposed by Unsecured Database
item.description: Nearly a million records, which appear to be linked to a medical cannabis card company in Ohio, included Social Security numbers, government IDs, health conditions, and more.
